entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DeflateStream truncation detection is buggy #72726
  • Can't go from build to wasm testing in one go on a M1 Mac #72722
  • [API Proposal]: Load assemblies from `ReadOnlySpan<byte>`. #72718
  • Stream.CopyTo does not respect buffer size parameter #72716

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Span<byte> constructor for MemoryStream #72723
  • The method does not work #72715
  • PerfLabTests.StackWalk.Walk has regressed on arm64 #67971
    7.0.0
  • Importer's spilling logic is incomplete in subtle ways #72133
    8.0.0
  • Randomly occurring ExecutionEngineException seemingly caused by GC #72466
    7.0.0
  • Multiple/unnecessary movzx/movsxd with char -> byte -> IntPtr casts #38794
    Future
  • System.Runtime.CompilerServices.AsynUnsafeAttribute - .NET7 Security #72711
  • Console.OutputEncoding by default returns a wrong value on Windows Nano Server #42959
    Future
  • ObjectDisposedException in System.Diagnostics.AsyncStreamReader.ReadBufferAsync #44453
    Future
  • LINQ: Combination of AsParallel, SelectMany and OrderBy of a custom IComparable throws when the enumerable contains duplicates #55159
    Future
  • crossgen.exe can't generate code for methods when the type has static Vector members #6873
    Future
  • Symbols for libnethost.lib not shipped #63602
    7.0.0
  • JsonStringEnumConverter does not properly serialize properties with default value (i.e. not set) #72699

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert MemoryMarshal.GetArrayDataReference to a JIT intrinsic #72725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add SqlTypes apis for SqlClient #72724
    area-System.Data.SqlClient, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: Generic exceptions #72721
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid unnecessary return val copying in tailcall-via-help #72720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Contain memory operands under casts #72719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection
  • JIT: Clone all local addresses when importing `dup` #72714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Return connection dispose in H3loopback connection #72713
    area-System.Net.Http
  • 30% optimization of `DateTime.GetDate()`/`.GetDatePart()` by 'Euclidean affine functions' #72712
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix typos #72709
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Add CertificateRevocationListBuilder #72708
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 7.0.0
  • Enable NJulianRuleTest #72707
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • Annotating System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource on AOT #72706
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Consolidate importer spilling code #72291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `lvVerTypeInfo` #71597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove char[] allocations from RegistryKey #66918
    area-Microsoft.Win32, tenet-performance
  • Add markdown readme for Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel #72660
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • Update some more dependencies pulling in Newtonsoft.Json 9.0.1 #72662
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve reliability of WarningsAsErrors replacement #72070
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Fix ClonedServer_ActsAsOriginalServer test #72698
    area-System.IO
  • `LibraryImport` generator `AllowUnsafeBlocks` diagnostic #72650
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Include libnethost.pdb in implementation packages #72688
    area-Setup

Updated

  • Fixed HWIntrinsic reflection bug with `NextCallReturnAddress` intrinsic #72505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Ensure prerequisites are installed on the perf pipeline #72431
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Make Type.GetTypeCode/IsEnum intrinsics #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Improve tiering performance #70649
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix x64 and x86 emulation on arm64 Windows #72693
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Hash the AssertionDsc struct for faster lookup #72700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: teach VN to fold type comparisons #72136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Ldap search crashes on Linux when timeout specified #72676
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Remove unnecessary newline from CI script #67861
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-tvos
  • [wasm] make debugger less noisy #72675
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add reference assembly for System.Private.CoreLib.dll #72143
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add analyzer support to validate the stateless marshaller shapes #72643
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Bail ThreadAbort redirection after catch handlers on Unix #72705
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the wrong GCInfo when testing GCStress. #72572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Testing sharing wasm builds, for running tests #72347
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
